postings.descriptionPlain:
About Userlane

Userlane is one of Europe’s fastest-growing technology companies. Our product is designed to make every software instantly accessible for any user and help companies improve their customer and employee engagement. If you are looking for an opportunity where you’ll tackle big problems alongside some of the most talented and dynamic people you’ve ever worked with, Userlane might be the perfect place for you. 


What does this role mean to us?

We are continuously ensuring the best quality of our technology platform. Our QA engineers are an integral part of our Product and Engineering team and are responsible for building ‘quality in’ rather than testing after. As a member of this team, you will be responsible for writing test cases, developing test scripts, e2e automated tests, test implementation & execution, and QA Sign Off. This includes creating, enhancing, debugging, and running tests, record test results, report, and verify software bug fixes as per the test plan. We are looking for someone, with a strong background in Cypress Automation and experience in automating Functional and Non-functional Test Cases. The role is expected to continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to revolutionize the platform’s capabilities.

What does this role mean to us?

We are continuously ensuring the best quality of our technology platform. Our QA engineers are an integral part of our Product and Engineering team and are responsible for building ‘quality in’ rather than testing after. As a member of this team, you will be responsible for writing test cases, developing test scripts, e2e automated tests, test implementation & execution, and QA Sign Off. This includes creating, enhancing, debugging, and running tests, record test results, report, and verify software bug fixes as per the test plan. We are looking for someone, with a strong background in Cypress Automation and experience in automating Functional and Non-functional Test Cases. The role is expected to continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to revolutionize the platform’s capabilities.

lists.content:
• Work closely with the product and development team when reviewing requirements and UI flows in order to understand use cases & functionality, create test plans, perform manual and automation testing, identify candidates for automation, and develop test scripts using Cypress, Typescript.
  • Identify, report, track bugs in JIRA, and test bug fixes throughout the release cycle.
  • Participate in designing, building, refactoring, and maintaining test automation frameworks to continuously improve test coverage, responsible for complete end-to-end validation and verification.
  • Support in the creation and enhancement of automated and manual software quality assurance systems, processes, and documentation.

• You have strong hands-on experience with manual testing techniques like Requirement Analysis and Review, Acceptance Criteria Validation, Designs Prototypes Confirmation, User Interface Verification, Test Planning, Test Reporting, Defect Tracking, QA Sign off, etc.
  • You have good programming skills (Javascript / Typescript) and at least 3+ years of practical experience with front-end test automation tools and libraries (Cypress.io preferred).
  • You have hands-on experience working with setting up, maintaining, and performing test automation frameworks on multiple application platforms, such as Web, Desktop, and Mobile, and building test scenarios and acceptance tests.
  • You have good knowledge of deploying tests with CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, using version control systems such as Git/Bitbucket, and defect management tools like JIRA.
  • You have good communication skills and you are fluent in English. 
  • You enjoy working with diverse teams on multiple projects, with wide-ranging backgrounds, cultures, & geographies and like to share the information/skills you’ve gathered with the team.

• Team & Culture: a high-performance culture with world-class leadership and a fun, engaged, motivated, and diverse team with members from over 20 countries
  • Compensation: significant financial upside with an attractive and incentivizing compensation package & growth opportunities
  • The DAP Market: Userlane is among the global leaders in the Digital Adoption market. At the same time, we are by far the youngest company in this market with the highest growth rate. 
  • Benefits for all aspects of your life: Depending on where you live, we offer flexible benefits related to Savings and Security, Health and well-being, and Lifestyle and Leisure.
  • 360° Flexibility: work from anywhere & flexible working hours: We are convinced that you know how to get the best out of yourself - no matter where and when. For us, it's the results that count, not the hours worked. 
  • Userlane University: Our internal university combines all external and internal training opportunities under one roof. So you always have an overview of how you can develop with us! In addition, all Userlaners get a 1.200,00 € yearly budget and 5 additional days off for personal development.
  • State-of-the-art equipment: Your basic equipment includes the latest Apple or Microsoft devices. If you work remotely, we make sure to provide you with all the hardware you need to work efficiently.

As a senior member of our Product and Engineering team, you will take ownership of various aspects of our product, design, build, and maintain software service artifacts in response to our business needs. Userlane is one of Europe’s fastest-growing technology companies. If you are looking for an opportunity where you’ll tackle big problems alongside some of the most talented and dynamic people you have ever worked with, Userlane might be the perfect place for you.

What does this role mean to us?

As a senior member of our Product and Engineering team, you will take ownership of various aspects of our product, design, build, and maintain software service artifacts in response to our business needs. As a backend engineer your main focus will be to write and maintain microservices following the industry best practices and patterns, balancing between a constant push for product innovation and a diligent attention to code quality. 
We are looking for someone with a strong background in microservices architecture, an open mind in adopting the right technology for the right task, and hands-on experience in building, testing, and monitoring services.

lists.content:
• Understand business requirements and analyze their impact on the design of our software services and tools.
  • Design, develop and maintain our backend services based on industry standards and best practices.
  • Write and execute tests following a TDD approach.
  • Research, propose, and deliver changes to our software architecture to address our engineering and product requirements.
  • Code reviews and full responsibility over small features.
  • Set up new (micro-)services, APIs, documentation, build pipelines.
  • Coach younger developers and when needed, steer a small project team doing simple to complicated tasks and collaborate with internal and external teams to deliver software that fits the overall ecosystem of our products.

• You have at least 3 years of hands-on experience in the design and development of software systems, and at least 1 years of experience in a service-oriented context.
  • You have hands-on experience in modern and open software development concepts, frameworks, and languages for the development of cloud-based tools and services; e.g. Golang, Protobuf and gRPC, Docker, Kubernetes, relational / NoSQL databases, RabbitMQ etc.
  • You have hands-on experience in modern software development concepts and technologies, in particular Golang; Java or PHP is a plus.
  • Good knowledge of Microservices architecture and container technologies.
  • Able to operate independently and apply strategic thinking with technical depth.
  • Continuous learning attitude, and ability to quickly learn new technologies.
  • Share information and skills you have gathered with the team.
  • Excellent communication skills and you are fluent in English.

• Our market provides sheer endless growth possibilities: Our Digital Adoption Platform can be used for any software which runs on a browser - no limitations! As digitalization is on everyone’s mind, our industry is expected to grow at the speed of light in the next few years.
  • Fast growth and the possibility to shape the future: Userlane is among the global leaders in the Digital Adoption market. At the same time, we are by far the youngest company in this market with the highest growth rate.
  • Team and Culture: Our culture strongly focuses on enabling and empowering team members so they can develop and grow in a positive environment. We are proud of our very talented, vibrant, and international team of like-minded, goal-oriented individuals.
  • Development and Compensation: Clear career paths and a transparent compensation framework including market-based salaries ensure clarity
  • 1200 € yearly budget for personal development. Usable for attending conferences, external training, or anything that will help you be the best in your role!
  • 5 additional days off per year for training  personal development purposes.
  • Your basic equipment includes the latest Apple or Microsoft devices. If you work remotely, we make sure to provide you with all the hardware you need to work efficiently.
